title: Google\Cloud\Datastream\V1\MysqlSslConfig
name: MysqlSslConfig
description:
MySQL SSL configuration information.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.datastream.v1.MysqlSslConfig

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.client_key
params.description: Input only. PEM-encoded private key associated with the Client Certificate. If this field is used then the 'client_certificate' and the 'ca_certificate' fields are mandatory.

params.name: data.client_key_set
params.description: Output only. Indicates whether the client_key field is set.

params.name: data.client_certificate
params.description: Input only. PEM-encoded certificate that will be used by the replica to authenticate against the source database server. If this field is used then the 'client_key' and the 'ca_certificate' fields are mandatory.

params.name: data.client_certificate_set
params.description: Output only. Indicates whether the client_certificate field is set.

params.name: data.ca_certificate
params.description: Input only. PEM-encoded certificate of the CA that signed the source database server's certificate.

params.name: data.ca_certificate_set
params.description: Output only. Indicates whether the ca_certificate field is set.
